General.Name: Al Yamamah Steel Industries Co
General.Description: Al Yamamah Steel Industries Company manufactures and sells metal products to construction, electrical, and telecommunication sectors in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It operates through Construction and Electricity segments. The company offers hot and cold rolled hollow steel sections, steel sheets, steel straps and clips, space frames, distribution and lighting poles, high masts, and telecommunications and overhead transmission line towers. It also manufactures metal structures and their parts for bridges and towers; and prefabricated steel structures for industrial facilities. Al Yamamah Steel Industries Company was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: New Akaria Building, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
